trans-unit.target: Analizar XML (Visual Basic) | Documentos de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Parsing XML (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: Analizar XML (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section describe how to parse XML documents.
trans-unit.target: Los temas de esta sección describen cómo analizar documentos XML.

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: En esta sección

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Tema

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descripción

trans-unit.source: [How to: Parse a String (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-parse-a-string.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: analizar una cadena (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-parse-a-string.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to parse a string to create an XML tree.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo analizar una cadena para crear un árbol XML.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Load XML from a File (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-load-xml-from-a-file.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: cargar XML desde un archivo (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-load-xml-from-a-file.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to load XML from a URI using the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo cargar XML desde un identificador URI mediante el <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Load%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/preserving-white-space-while-loading-or-parsing-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [Mantener un espacio en blanco al cargar o analizar XML](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/preserving-white-space-while-loading-or-parsing-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how to control the white space behavior of [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] while loading XML trees.
trans-unit.target: Describe cómo controlar el comportamiento de los espacios en blanco de [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] al cargar árboles XML.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Catch Parsing Errors (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-catch-parsing-errors.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: detectar errores (Visual Basic) de análisis](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-catch-parsing-errors.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to detect badly formed or invalid XML.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo detectar XML no válido o mal formado.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Create a Tree from an XmlReader (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-create-a-tree-from-an-xmlreader.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: crear un árbol de XmlReader (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-create-a-tree-from-an-xmlreader.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to create an XML tree directly from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo crear un árbol XML directamente desde un <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: [How to: Stream XML Fragments from an XmlReader (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-stream-xml-fragments-from-an-xmlreader.md)
trans-unit.target: [Cómo: transmitir por secuencias fragmentos XML de XmlReader (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-stream-xml-fragments-from-an-xmlreader.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to stream XML fragments by using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Muestra cómo transmitir por secuencias fragmentos XML mediante el uso de un <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: When you have to process arbitrarily large XML files, it might not be feasible to load the whole XML tree into memory.
trans-unit.target: Cuando deba procesar archivos XML de gran tamaño de forma arbitraria, quizás no sea factible cargar la totalidad del árbol XML en la memoria.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can stream XML fragments.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, puede transmitir por secuencias fragmentos XML.

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: Vea también

trans-unit.target: [Crear árboles XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/creating-xml-trees.md)
